bibl.title: Menander, Misoumenos A31-6.
bibl.note: Replies to E.G. TURNER, Menander and the New Society of his Time, ChrEg 54 (1979) No. 107, p. 114, who criticised the distribution of speakers suggested by the author in CR N.S., 30 (1980) p. 5.
bibl.seg: BROWN Peter G. McC., Menander, Misoumenos A31-6.
